operation exec public web ; Your SCOPE block here (optional)... ; Your VARIABLES block here (optional)... ; Your implementation here... ; Return execution status: ; return 0 ; return >= 0 typically indicates a succesful execution ; return -1 ; return < 0 typically indicates an error during execution return 0 end trigger preActivate variables string vWebServerContext, vCookie, vSession, vUserContext, vOuter numeric i endvariables #comment ; $cmpStateManagedBy is specified by component property 'State Stored By' #if (<$cmpStateManagedBy> == 1) ; Cookie (client side state management) ;- Get state from cookie getitem/id vCookie, $webinfo("COOKIESIN"), "MY_VARLIST_COOKIE" getlistitems/id/component vCookie ; Insert your code... #elsif (<$cmpStateManagedBy> == 2) ; State managing component ; Get state from state managing component (server side state management) vWebServerContext = $webinfo("WEBSERVERCONTEXT") getitem/id vSession, vWebServerContext, "SESSION" vUserContext = "" activate "USYSSTAT".getState(vSession, $instancename, vUserContext) getlistitems/id /component vUserContext ; Insert your code... #endif ; Insert more code here... ; Parse client web request selectcase $webrequesttype case "DYNAMIC" webload ; Get Data if ($procerror < 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = getErrorPage("WEBLOAD Failed", $procerrorcontext) return -1 endif forlist vOuter in $componentinfo($instancename, "OUTERENTITIES") reconnect "%%vOuter%%%" ; Reconnect Data if ($procerror < 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = getErrorPage("RECONNECT Failed", $procerrorcontext) return -1 elseif ($status != 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = getErrorPage("RECONNECT Failed", "$status=%%$status%%%&uSEP;ENTITY=%%vOuter%%%") return -1 endif endfor websetocc ; Set Occurrence Context if ($procerror < 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = getErrorPage("WEBSETOCC Failed", $procerrorcontext) return -1 endif endselectcase ; Return execution status: ; return 0 - continue with operation execution ; return -1 - reject operation execution and return an error to the web server (yellow page) return 0 end trigger postActivate variables string vWebServerCntxt, vSessionId, vVarlist endvariables ; ======================================================================================= ; Generate web response ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- selectcase $webresponsetype case "UPDATE" ; Update page websave ; Generate data if ($procerror < 0) webmessage/error getErrorMessage("websave failed", $procerrorcontext) return 0 endif case "FULLPAGE" ; Initial page ; Provide the layout, some options: ; 1. Use the layout of the DSP component itself: ; No additional code required ; 2. Load a layout from file, optionally process it, and assign it to the instance: ; fileload "filename.html", vLayout ; call processLayout(vLayout) ; $instancelayout = vLayout ; 3. Use the layout of the DSP component itself, process it, and assign it back to the instance: ; vLayout = $instancelayout ; call processLayout(vLayout) ; $instancelayout = vLayout ; Add instance layout to initial web response weblayout if ($procerror < 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = getErrorPage("weblayout failed", $procerrorcontext) return -1 endif ; Provide DSP component definitions, some options: ; 1. Set default field properties: ; putitem/id $properties("MYFIELD.MYENTITY") ; 2. Set default field valreps: ; putitem/id $valrep("MYFIELD.MYENTITY") ; Add component definitions (including defaults) to initial web response webdefinitions if ($procerror < 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = getErrorPage("weblayout failed", $procerrorcontext) return -1 endif ; Add component data to initial web response ; (During websave, occurrence triggers preSerialize and postSerialize are fired to influence occurrence serialization.) websave if ($procerror < 0) webmessage/error getErrorMessage("websave failed", $procerrorcontext) return 0 endif endselectcase ; ======================================================================================= ; ======================================================================================= ; Set state ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- #comment ; $cmpStateManagedBy is specified by component property 'State Stored By' #if (<$cmpStateManagedBy> == 1) ; Cookie ; Initialize vVarList with all component variables. vVarlist = $componentinfo($instancename, "VARIABLES") ; Add the current values of the component variables to vVarList. putlistitems/id/component vVarlist ; Add more state here... putitem/id $webinfo("COOKIESOUT"), "MY_VARLIST_COOKIE", vVarlist #elsif (<$cmpStateManagedBy> == 2) ; State manager component vWebServerCntxt = $webinfo("WEBSERVERCONTEXT") getitem/id vSessionId, vWebServerCntxt, "SESSION" ; Initialize vVarList with all component variables. vVarlist = $componentinfo($instancename, "VARIABLES") ; Add the current values of the component variables to vVarList. putlistitems/id/component vVarlist ; Add more state here... activate "USYSSTAT".setState(vSessionId, $instancename, vVarlist) #endif ; ======================================================================================= ; Return your execution status ; return 0 - specifies return 0 end entry getErrorPage ; Returns HTML error page returns string params string pHeader : IN string pContextList : IN endparams variables string vMessage, vAdditionalList endvariables vMessage = $replace($htmlmessage, 1, "__HEADER__", pHeader) vAdditionalList = $item("ADDITIONAL", pContextList) delitem/id pContextList, "ADDITIONAL" pContextList = $concat(pContextList, "&uSEP;&uSEP;Additional:&uSEP;", vAdditionalList) pContextList = $replace(pContextList, 1, "COMPONENT", "DSP_INSTANCE=%%$instancename%%%&uSEP;COMPONENT") vMessage = $replace(vMessage, 1, "__MESSAGE__", $replace(pContextList, 1, "&uSEP;", "
", -1)) return vMessage htmlmessage:blockdata ~ __HEADER__
__MESSAGE__
~ end entry getErrorMessage ; Returns error message returns string params string pHeader : IN string pContextList : IN endparams variables string vMessage, vAdditionalList endvariables vAdditionalList = $item("ADDITIONAL", pContextList) delitem/id pContextList, "ADDITIONAL" pContextList = $concat(pContextList, "&uSEP;&uSEP;Additional:&uSEP;", vAdditionalList) pContextList = $replace(pContextList, 1, "COMPONENT", "DSP_INSTANCE=%%$instancename%%%&uSEP;COMPONENT") vMessage = $concat(pHeader, "%%^", $replace(pContextList, 1, "&uSEP;", "%%^", -1)) return vMessage end

; Your component defines here (optional)...
; Your component VARIABLES block here (optional)... variables string output_prefix endvariables

operation exec public web variables string urlpresented string type string qualifier string item string subitem string debugstring string requestmethod, server_variables, sentparameters string accept, content_type, output_type, uppercasecontent string url string fixedpath numeric vStatus string model endvariables urlpresented = $webinfo("PATHINPUT") ; ; No complete path specified so return a 204 ; getitem/id server_variables, $webinfo("WEBSERVERCONTEXT"), "SERVERVARIABLES" getitem/id requestmethod, server_variables, "REQUEST_METHOD" vStatus = $split($item("SERVER_PROTOCOL", server_variables), 1, "/", url, "") url = $concat($concat($lowercase(url), "://", $item("SERVER_NAME", server_variables), ":", $item("SERVER_PORT", server_variables)), $item("REQUEST_URI", server_variables)) getitem/id accept, $webinfo("HTTPREQUESTHEADERS"), "accept" getitem/id content_type, $webinfo("HTTPREQUESTHEADERS"), "content-type" getitem/id sentparameters, $webinfo("INPUT"), "format" putmess "%%$componentname - sentParameters = '%%sentparameters'" output_type = "JSON" ; ; If you want to enable XML checking ; ; if ($uppercase(sentparameters) = "XML" ) putmess "%%$componentname - sentParameters = '%%sentparameters' accept='%%accept'" output_type = "XML" endif if (requestmethod = "OPTIONS") $webinfo("status") = "200" putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Allow","GET,HEAD,OPTIONS" $webinfo("output") = "Allow: GET, HEAD, OPTIONS"; return (0) endif if ($length(urlpresented) = 0) $webinfo("status")="204" $webinfo("output") = "%%$output_prefix$ 204 No Data Present" return (0) endif ; ; Method other than GET/HEAD specified ; if (requestmethod != "GET" && requestmethod != "HEAD") $webinfo("status") = "405" return (0) endif putmess "%%$componentname - URL = '%%url'" putmess "%%$componentname - Bound to = ''" putmess "%%$componentname - output_type = '%%output_type'" getitem type, urlpresented, 1 getitem qualifier, urlpresented, 2 getitem item, urlpresented, 3 getitem subitem, urlpresented, 4 putmess "%%$componentname - type = '%%type'" putmess "%%$componentname - qualifier = '%%qualifier'" putmess "%%$componentname - item = '%%item'" putmess "%%$componentname - subitem = '%%subitem'" ; Structure of the URL ; ; /type/qualifier/item/subitem ; vStatus = $split($lowercase(""),1 ,".", fixedpath, model ) putmess "%%$componentname - vStatus = %%vStatus" putmess "%%$componentname - fixedpath = '%%fixedpath'" putmess "%%$componentname - type = '%%type'" putmess "%%$componentname - model = '%%model'" selectcase type case fixedpath $webinfo("status") = runthis( qualifier, item, url, output_type, requestmethod) elsecase $webinfo("status") = "404" ; Return Not Found endselectcase return 0 end trigger preActivate variables string vWebServerContext, vCookie, vSession, vUserContext, vOuter numeric i endvariables #comment ; $cmpStateManagedBy is specified by component property 'State Stored By' #if (<$cmpStateManagedBy> == 1) ; Cookie (client side state management) ;- Get state from cookie getitem/id vCookie, $webinfo("COOKIESIN"), "MY_VARLIST_COOKIE" getlistitems/id/component vCookie ; Insert your code... #elsif (<$cmpStateManagedBy> == 2) ; State managing component ; Get state from state managing component (server side state management) vWebServerContext = $webinfo("WEBSERVERCONTEXT") getitem/id vSession, vWebServerContext, "SESSION" vUserContext = "" activate "USYSSTAT".getState(vSession, $instancename, vUserContext) getlistitems/id /component vUserContext ; Insert your code... #endif ; Insert more code here... ; Parse client web request selectcase $webrequesttype case "DYNAMIC" webload ; Get Data if ($procerror < 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = getErrorPage("WEBLOAD Failed", $procerrorcontext) return -1 endif forlist vOuter in $componentinfo($instancename, "OUTERENTITIES") reconnect "%%vOuter%%%" ; Reconnect Data if ($procerror < 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = getErrorPage("RECONNECT Failed", $procerrorcontext) return -1 elseif ($status != 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = getErrorPage("RECONNECT Failed", "$status=%%$status%%%&uSEP;ENTITY=%%vOuter%%%") return -1 endif endfor websetocc ; Set Occurrence Context if ($procerror < 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = getErrorPage("WEBSETOCC Failed", $procerrorcontext) return -1 endif endselectcase ; Return execution status: ; return 0 - continue with operation execution ; return -1 - reject operation execution and return an error to the web server (yellow page) return 0 end trigger postActivate variables string vWebServerCntxt, vSessionId, vVarlist endvariables ; ======================================================================================= ; Generate web response ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- selectcase $webresponsetype case "UPDATE" ; Update page websave ; Generate data if ($procerror < 0) webmessage/error getErrorMessage("websave failed", $procerrorcontext) return 0 endif case "FULLPAGE" ; Initial page ; Provide the layout, some options: ; 1. Use the layout of the DSP component itself: ; No additional code required ; 2. Load a layout from file, optionally process it, and assign it to the instance: ; fileload "filename.html", vLayout ; call processLayout(vLayout) ; $instancelayout = vLayout ; 3. Use the layout of the DSP component itself, process it, and assign it back to the instance: ; vLayout = $instancelayout ; call processLayout(vLayout) ; $instancelayout = vLayout ; Add instance layout to initial web response weblayout if ($procerror < 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = getErrorPage("weblayout failed", $procerrorcontext) return -1 endif ; Provide DSP component definitions, some options: ; 1. Set default field properties: ; putitem/id $properties("MYFIELD.MYENTITY") ; 2. Set default field valreps: ; putitem/id $valrep("MYFIELD.MYENTITY") ; Add component definitions (including defaults) to initial web response webdefinitions if ($procerror < 0) $webinfo("OUTPUT") = getErrorPage("weblayout failed", $procerrorcontext) return -1 endif ; Add component data to initial web response ; (During websave, occurrence triggers preSerialize and postSerialize are fired to influence occurrence serialization.) websave if ($procerror < 0) webmessage/error getErrorMessage("websave failed", $procerrorcontext) return 0 endif endselectcase ; ======================================================================================= ; ======================================================================================= ; Set state ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- #comment ; $cmpStateManagedBy is specified by component property 'State Stored By' #if (<$cmpStateManagedBy> == 1) ; Cookie ; Initialize vVarList with all component variables. vVarlist = $componentinfo($instancename, "VARIABLES") ; Add the current values of the component variables to vVarList. putlistitems/id/component vVarlist ; Add more state here... putitem/id $webinfo("COOKIESOUT"), "MY_VARLIST_COOKIE", vVarlist #elsif (<$cmpStateManagedBy> == 2) ; State manager component vWebServerCntxt = $webinfo("WEBSERVERCONTEXT") getitem/id vSessionId, vWebServerCntxt, "SESSION" ; Initialize vVarList with all component variables. vVarlist = $componentinfo($instancename, "VARIABLES") ; Add the current values of the component variables to vVarList. putlistitems/id/component vVarlist ; Add more state here... activate "USYSSTAT".setState(vSessionId, $instancename, vVarlist) #endif ; ======================================================================================= ; Return your execution status ; return 0 - specifies return 0 end entry getErrorPage ; Returns HTML error page returns string params string pHeader : IN string pContextList : IN endparams variables string vMessage, vAdditionalList endvariables vMessage = $replace($htmlmessage, 1, "__HEADER__", pHeader) vAdditionalList = $item("ADDITIONAL", pContextList) delitem/id pContextList, "ADDITIONAL" pContextList = $concat(pContextList, "&uSEP;&uSEP;Additional:&uSEP;", vAdditionalList) pContextList = $replace(pContextList, 1, "COMPONENT", "DSP_INSTANCE=%%$instancename%%%&uSEP;COMPONENT") vMessage = $replace(vMessage, 1, "__MESSAGE__", $replace(pContextList, 1, "&uSEP;", "
", -1)) return vMessage htmlmessage:blockdata ~ __HEADER__
__MESSAGE__
~ end entry getErrorMessage ; Returns error message returns string params string pHeader : IN string pContextList : IN endparams variables string vMessage, vAdditionalList endvariables vAdditionalList = $item("ADDITIONAL", pContextList) delitem/id pContextList, "ADDITIONAL" pContextList = $concat(pContextList, "&uSEP;&uSEP;Additional:&uSEP;", vAdditionalList) pContextList = $replace(pContextList, 1, "COMPONENT", "DSP_INSTANCE=%%$instancename%%%&uSEP;COMPONENT") vMessage = $concat(pHeader, "%%^", $replace(pContextList, 1, "&uSEP;", "%%^", -1)) return vMessage end ; ******************************************************************************** entry runthis params string qualifier : IN ; The Container object string itemtofind : IN ; The item to retrieve string url : IN ; The URL string content_type : IN ; XML or JSON string request_method : IN ; HEAD or GET endparams variables string JSONrecords numeric totalOcc string outputFieldList struct ComponentStruct xmlstream XMLRecords endvariables putmess "%%$componentname - runthis " clear/e "" >/init = qualifier if ($length(itemtofind ) > 0) >/init = itemtofind endif retrieve/e "" setocc "",1 if (request_method = "HEAD") JSONRecords = "OK" $webinfo("OUTPUT") = $concat( $OUTPUT_PREFIX$, JSONrecords) if ($hits("") > 0) return (200) else return (404) endif endif totalOcc = $hits("") putmess "%%$componentname - totalOcc = '%%totalOcc'" if ($hits("") = 0 | $hits("") = "" ) JSONRecords = "Not found" return (404) endif putmess "%%$componentname - Setting HTTPResponseHeaders" putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Access-Control-Allow-Origin","http://localhost" putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Allow-Origin","http://localhost" putmess "%%$componentname - Checking ContentType" if (content_type = "XML") putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Content-Type", "application/xml" ; removed charset= else putmess "%%$componentname - content-type = application/json" putitem/id $webinfo("httpresponseheaders"),"Content-Type", "application/json" ; removed charset= endif ComponentToStruct ComponentStruct, "" putmess "%%$componentname - ComponentToStruct $status = %%$status" if (content_type = "XML") StructToXML XMLRecords, ComponentStruct putmess "%%$componentname - XMLRecords = '%%XMLRecords'" JSONRecords = XMLRecords ; ; Finish the XML stuff ; else StructToJSON /whitespace JSONRecords, ComponentStruct putmess "%%$componentname - JSONRecords = '%%JSONRecords'" endif $webinfo("OUTPUT") = JSONrecords return(200) end;- runthis

<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta name="default" content="Uniface 10" /> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../css/uniface.css" /> </head> <body class="u"> <!-- class "u" enables some minor pre-styled CSS rules in ../css/uniface.css -->
Your content here...
</body> </html>

trigger read ; This trigger is fired as part of the retrieve process. ; Make sure not to leave the context of this occurrence, it would disrupt the trigger flow and give unpredictable results.
read
end
trigger lock ; This trigger is fired as part of a database lock request. ; Make sure not to leave the context of this occurrence, it would disrupt the trigger flow and give unpredictable results.
lock if ($status = -10) reload
end
trigger validateKey ; This trigger is fired as part of the validate/store process. ; Make sure not to leave the context of this occurrence, it would disrupt the trigger flow and give unpredictable results.
findkey $entname, $curkey if ($procerror < 0) ; procerror $result = $procerrorcontext return -1 ; procerror endif selectcase $status case 0 ; key not found if ($foreign) return -2 ; non existing key in up entity case 1 ; key found in Component if (!$foreign) return -3 ; duplicate key in down entity case 2 ; key found in DBMS if (!$foreign) return -4 ; duplicate key in down entity elsecase return $status endselectcase
; If we reach this point, validation was successful return 0
end
trigger write ; This trigger is fired as part of the store process. ; Make sure not to leave the context of this occurrence, it would disrupt the trigger flow and give unpredictable results.
; Your last moment field updates here... if($dbocc = 0) CREATEDBY = $user CREATEDON = $date else UPDATEDBY = $user UPDATEDON = $date endif
write
end
trigger delete ; This trigger is fired as part of the store/erase process. ; Make sure not to leave the context of this occurrence, it would disrupt the trigger flow and give unpredictable results.
delete
end
